property.name: text
property.value: Running this demo executes a "make" command. To see the make command, look inside the the composite actors (CntToLedsAndRfm and RfmToLeds) and then look inside the inner actors (CntToLedsAndRfm and RfmToLeds) then select Debug -> Listen to Director

property.name: text
property.value: This model contains two nodes. CntToLedsAndRfm contains an application that blinks the LEDs as a binary counter and sends a radio packet with the current value of the counter. RfmToLeds contains an application that will receive the packet and display the counter value on the LEDs. Note that we are using a lossless wireless channel. The sent and received packet values are displayed in separate Display windows.
